label: Charli CEO
narrative: Leadership role for an enterprise or organization.

likes: Networking, business development, and collaborating on enterprise engagement.

product: Provide organization-wide visibility into contributions to make it easy for leadership to see a report of their activities.
education: Policy summits and case studies are valuable.
Provide training and education resources that can be given to managers and engineering teams within my organization.
communications: Integration with other Linux Foundation projects the organization also relies upon.
Cross-project engagement and enterprise adoption messaging.
Provide clear messaging on relevance of OpenSSF to achieve business outcomes for an enterprise.
sales: Provide leadership opportunities on working groups, governing boards, or policy initiatives to further the executive's influence and visibility to cement their commitment.
marketing: Provide opportunities for enterprise leaders to be seen as though leaders and grow awareness in the ecosystem of their contributions.
Facilitate speaking opportunities, co-authoring of content, and featuring organizations in case studies.
